fields.description:
h5.Description
A BlackBerry application can be successfully packaged and installed to device, however the application itself will open, crash and close itself almost instantly.

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Create a default BlackBerry application
2. Package the application
3. Run the packaged app on device

h5.Expected Result
Application should launch

h5.Actual Result
Application crashes on launch
fields.summary: BlackBerry: A packaged application fails to launch on device
fields.environment:
